Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the auth policy.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The state of the auth policy. The auth policy is only active when the auth type is set to   AWS_IAM. If you provide a policy, then authentication and authorization decisions are made based on this policy and the client's IAM policy. If the auth type is NONE, then any auth policy you provide will remain inactive.
